title: Ruhr Valley – The Heart of German Football
description: The second season of the ‘Bundesliga Original Series’ tells the story of a special region full of football passion. The series follows Dortmund, Bochum and Schalke through the second half of the 2024/25 season, but above all it portrays the Ruhr region as the epicentre of German football and shows the most emotional and greatest moments of the three clubs mentioned. For example, the series tells the stories of the European club titles in 1997, Schalkes near-championship in 2001, the Klopp era at Borussia Dortmund and Bochums historic fight against relegation in 2024

The tour ends on the pitch of the Ruhrstadion, where Neururer performs his legendary dance routine from 2004 once again.

title: West Ham vs Chelsea- English Premier League 2024/25 Week 5
description: West Ham have alternated between winning and not winning in their last 10 Premier League home games against Chelsea, beating them 3-1 at the London Stadium last term. They last won consecutive home league games against the Blues in 2001-02/2002-03. Chelsea have won 30 of their 56 Premier League meetings with West Ham, only winning more times against Tottenham in the competition’s history.

title: Fulham vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2024/25 Week 5

title: Tottenham v Brentford - English Premier League 2024/25 Week 5
description: The team scoring first has won none of the last four Premier League meetings between Tottenham and Brentford, with Spurs coming from behind to win this exact fixture 3-2 last season. title: Liverpool vs AFC Bournemouth - English Premier League 2024/25 Week 5
description: Liverpool have won nine of their last 10 Premier League meetings with Bournemouth, with the exception being a 1-0 away defeat in March 2023. title: Espanyol vs Deportivo Alaves - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 5
description: Espanyol have not lost any of their last seven home games against Alaves in LaLiga, their best unbeaten run at home against them in the top-flight. Following their 2-1 win at Mendizorroza in May 2022, Deportivo Alaves have the chance to win back-to-back matches against Espanyol in LaLiga for only the second time in history, after three wins consecutively between 2001 and 2003.

title: Celta de Vigo vs Real Valladolid - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 5
description: Celta de Vigo have won just one of their last eight matches against Real Valladolid in LaLiga, with that victory coming in their last meeting in February 2023. Celta de Vigo had won 10 of their previous 14 meetings in the competition. Real Valladolid have not won any of their last 13 away games against Celta de Vigo in LaLiga, although have drawn seven of them. In total, the Valladolid side have drawn more away games against the Galicians than against any other opponent in the competition.

title: More than a Match - Derby of Baghdad
description: Baghdad is hosting one of the most passionate football derbies. The passion that this match gives off throughout the city is incredible. The history, the culture, the anecdotes are told through this documentary, the derby of Baghdad is more than a game.

title: Real Sociedad vs Real Madrid - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 5
description: Real Sociedad have won points in four of their last eight games against Real Madrid in LaLiga, having lost in nine of their previous 11 against them in the competition. After three consecutive away defeats to Real Sociedad in LaLiga between 2002 and 2004, Real Madrid have lost only three of their last 17 away games against them in the top-flight.

title: LaLiga BEST 11 - Luis García
description: Luis Garcia was a striker who played 8 seasons in La Liga. He played for Barcelona, Real Valladolid, Atletico Madrid and Real Racing in La Liga. In his career he played 473 games, scoring 115 goals.

title: Girona vs Barcelona - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 5
description: Girona won both of their meetings with Barcelona in LaLiga last season, becoming only the fourth team in the history of the competition to complete a season double over the Blaugranas while scoring 4+ goals in each of them, after Real Madrid in 1929/30, Valencia in 1941/42 and UD Salamanca in 1997/98. FC Barcelona have won three of their four away games against Girona in LaLiga, only Villarreal have managed more away wins against Girona in the top-flight.

title: Real Mallorca vs Villarreal - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 5
description: Mallorca have won four of their last nine games against Villarreal in LaLiga, just one win fewer than in their other 25 top-flight meetings. Villarreal have won just one of their last seven away games against Mallorca in LaLiga, winning on their last visit in August 2023, having been unbeaten in their previous eight visits to the island in the competition.

description: Athletic have lost three of their last five games against Celta Vigo in LaLiga, as many defeats as in their previous 20 games against the Galicians in the competition. title: Holstein Kiel vs Bochum - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 21
description: Holstein Kiel will host VfL Bochum in the Bundesliga for the first time. The Storks remained unbeaten at home in the second division against VfL, picking up 10 of a possible 12 points. However, Bochum have tasted victory in Kiel in the DFB-Pokal, winning 2-1 in the second round in November 2002. This match-up sees second-bottom Holstein Kiel welcome last-placed VfL Bochum. The last four Bundesliga meetings between the sides in these positions all saw the bottom club remain unbeaten, even winning on three occasions. The last 18th-placed side that lost to a team sitting 17th was VfL Bochum themselves, when they were beaten 4-1 at VfB Stuttgart in October 2022.

title: Bochum vs Borussia Dortmund - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 22
description: VfL Bochum have only won one of their last 13 Bundesliga games against Borussia Dortmund and are winless in six Bundesliga home games against BVB since 2007. All three of VfL’s top-flight home games against Dortmund since promotion in 2021 have ended 1-1 after the hosts went 1-0 up. With 11 points from the first 21 games, this is VfL Bochum’s worst ever Bundesliga campaign. No team in league history with a record this poor at this stage of the season has ever stayed up. VfL have picked up 82% of their points in 2024/25 at home, the highest proportion of any side.

title: Bayer Leverkusen vs Bayern Munchen - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 22
description: Bayer 04 Leverkusen are enjoying a five-game unbeaten run against FC Bayern in all competitions for the first time. The last German club to go longer without losing to Bayern was Hamburger SV from 2007 to 2009. League leaders FC Bayern travel to second-placed Bayer 04 Leverkusen for this match-up – the team in first place has only won one of their last seven Bundesliga games against the side in second and that was Leverkusen’s 3-0 home win over Bayern last season. FCB’s previous meetings with second-placed sides this season have been draws at home to Leverkusen and away in Frankfurt.

However, SVW are currently winless in nine Bundesliga games at home against TSG — they are only on a longer wait for a win on home soil versus FC Bayern. TSG Hoffenheim led 3-0 after 12 minutes at home against Werder in this season’s reverse fixture, the earliest they have ever led by a three-goal margin in their top-flight history. title: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Holstein Kiel - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 22
description: Holstein Kiel and Eintracht Frankfurt have faced each other twice in all competitions since the Bundesliga was founded. The Eagles ran out 4-2 winners in Kiel in the first round of the DFB-Pokal back in 1996/97 and also won by the same scoreline away at the Storks earlier this term. Eintracht Frankfurt are unbeaten in their last 13 Bundesliga games against promoted sides – they have only ever managed a longer run between 2008 and 2012. Last season, SGE took 10 of a possible 12 points against promoted sides, and have picked up six out of six so far in 2024/25.

title: Ruhr Valley – The Heart of German Football
description: Episode 4 then looks at the great era of Jurgen Klopp at Borussia Dortmund with the 2011 championship and the double win in 2012. The series also includes previously unreleased behind-the-scenes footage of the then BVB player Patrick Owomoyela and shows Klopps speech in the dressing room before the last game of 2010/11. The cameras also follow two of Schalkes almost 30,000 away fans around the second division away game in Berlin and Bochums cult coach Peter Neururer on a tour through the Ruhr valley on his Harley. The tour ends on the pitch of the Ruhrstadion, where Neururer performs his legendary dance routine from 2004 once again.

title: Borussia Dortmund vs Union Berlin - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 23
description: Borussia Dortmund have won all five of their Bundesliga home games against Union Berlin. BVB haven’t faced any team more often at home in the top flight without ever dropping points, while Union haven’t played any side more often away from home without ever collecting at least a point. Nine of the 11 Bundesliga games between these two sides have ended in a home win. 29 points from 22 games represents Borussia Dortmund’s worst Bundesliga season since 2014/15. BVB have conceded 38 goals this term, their worst defensive record after 22 matchdays since 1985/96 when they only stayed up via the relegation play-off.

title: Bayern Munchen vs Eintracht Frankfurt - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 23
description: FC Bayern Munchen have beaten Eintracht Frankfurt 42 times at home in the Bundesliga. In league history, no other club has ever recorded as many home wins against one opponent. The 3-3 draw in Frankfurt earlier this season saw Bayern drop points from a winning position for the only time in the league in 2024/25. With 55 points from 22 games, this is FC Bayern’s best Bundesliga season in seven years. The Bavarians have only dropped two points at home so far in 2024/25, the best return of any team across Europe’s top five leagues.

title: Bundesliga - Special 2024/2025 Icon : Thomas Muller
description: Bayern Munchen’s 34th German title was, in many ways, far from routine. Once it became clear that this would be Thomas Muller’s final season on the playing staff, the march towards the Meisterschale took on a yet greater significance. Muller bowed out in the appropriate style with a record-extending 13th German championship success

title: RB Leipzig vs Heidenheim - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 23
description: RB Leipzig have won all three Bundesliga meetings to date with 1. FC Heidenheim – they have only played Hannover 96 more often and won each time in the top flight. Heidenheim have only also lost all three of their Bundesliga fixtures against Leverkusen and Frankfurt. 1. FC Heidenheim have lost all five of their games in the second half of this season, making them just the 11th team in league history to start the second half of a campaign with five straight defeats. Overall, Frank Schmidt’s team have lost 16 times in 2024/25, a league high.

title: Borussia Monchengladbach vs Augsburg - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 23
description: FC Augsburg have won five of their last eight Bundesliga games against Borussia Monchengladbach, including each of the last two. The Fuggerstadter could now do a league double over the Foals for only the second time. FCA have only recorded more top-flight wins over Werder Bremen and Mainz 05 than they have against Gladbach. With 34 points from 22 games, this is Borussia Monchengladbach’s best Bundesliga campaign in five years, since they had 43 points on the board in 2019/20 and eventually finished fourth to qualify for the Champions League. The Foals have now already got as many points as they finished last season with.

description: FC Bayern have won 70 of their 111 Bundesliga games against VfB Stuttgart – no other team has beaten a single opponent as often in league history. title: Heidenheim vs Borussia Monchengladbach - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 24
description: 1. FC Heidenheim are without a win in their five competitive meetings with Borussia Monchengladbach to date, losing twice and drawing once in the Bundesliga and suffering two defeats in the second round of the DFB-Pokal. 1. FC Heidenheim have only won one of their last 18 Bundesliga games, collecting just six of a possible 54 points, a league low during this period. They are currently on a seven-match winless streak, something that’s only previously happened to them in the top flight from October to December 2024. However, their 2-2 draw in Leipzig last time out was their first point since mid-January, although they remain bottom of a table representing the second half of the season with jus

title: Ruhr Valley – The Heart of German Football
description: Episode 4 then looks at the great era of Jurgen Klopp at Borussia Dortmund with the 2011 championship and the double win in 2012. The series also includes previously unreleased behind-the-scenes footage of the then BVB player Patrick Owomoyela and shows Klopps speech in the dressing room before the last game of 2010/11. The cameras also follow two of Schalkes almost 30,000 away fans around the second division away game in Berlin and Bochums cult coach Peter Neururer on a tour through the Ruhr valley on his Harley. The tour ends on the pitch of the Ruhrstadion, where Neururer performs his legendary dance routine from 2004 once again.

title: St. Pauli vs Borussia Dortmund - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 24
description: FC St. Pauli won their last home game against Borussia Dortmund, a 2-1 victory in the round of 16 of the DFB-Pokal in January 2022. However, that is the Kiezkicker’s only victory from their last 13 competitive meetings with BVB. FC St. Pauli have lost three straight Bundesliga games for the first time since the start of this season, while they have also failed to score in three consecutive top-flight matches for the first time since February/March 2011. The Kiezkicker have drawn a blank 13 times this season and scored only 18 goals.

title: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Bayer Leverkusen - Bundesliga 2024/25 Week 24
description: None of the 79 Bundesliga meetings between Eintracht Frankfurt and Bayer 04 Leverkusen have ended 0-0 – no other fixture has been played as often in top-flight history without ever ending goalless. There hasn’t even been a score draw in the last 20 Bundesliga clashes between the two sides. Eintracht Frankfurt have lost each of their last four Bundesliga meetings with Bayer 04 Leverkusen, their longest ongoing losing run against any current top-flight side. Meanwhile, the Werkself have only ever put together a longer Bundesliga winning streak against the Eagles between 1998 and 2003.

title: Sports Clinic: The revolution of recovery methods at the hub of Sports Medicine
description: Aspetar recognizes the importance of effective recovery for athletes following their rigorous rehabilitation sessions. This episode highlights key recovery techniques, including sports massage, cold water immersion, and hot/cold contrast therapy.To ensure athletes maintain their fitness conditioning while recovering from injury, Aspetar provides a fully equipped recovery area, staffed by specialists trained to manage individual fitness needsThese steps not only protect the injured area but also enhance overall physical conditioning, ensuring a smooth transition back to sport.

title: My Faith in Sport - Salah
description: Exploring the importance of prayer within Islam, the episode begins with an overview of our seven athletes as they introduce themselves and why Islam is so important to them. We are also introduced to Omar Sulieman, a notable Imam, who acts as narration throughout the series and a guiding voice on the key principles of Islam. The life and career of Sofyan Amrabat is explored, showcasing his role as a key part of the Fenerbahce team in Turkey and the Moroccan national side. The Atlas Lions’ run to the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 is explored, with the impact that Salah played in the team’s belief and positivity throughout the tournament.

El Estadio de Butarque recently hosted the second edition of ‘LaLiga de lasMascotas’, a competition involving LALIGA’s club mascots. We also meet Álvaro Martín, an Olympic gold medalist who takes toButarque to experience his passion for CD Leganes firsthand.

title: My Faith in Sport - Sawm
description: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab. Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan.
